EmailTemplate.name: 1 day appointment Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Anderson Business Advisors
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Appointment Reminder
Hello,
This is a friendly reminder about your scheduled upcoming appointment with Anderson Business Advisors. If you have any questions, please contact the office directly.
Thank you and have a great day.
I will be giving you a call at our scheduled time. If you need to cancel or change, please feel free to contact me at 800.706.4741.
